text: I have a problem: the Yggdrasil build of Cbc_jll uses a [patch](<https://github.com/JuliaPackaging/Yggdrasil/blob/master/C/Coin-OR/Cbc/bundled/patches/no_lp.patch>) that  I would like to get rid of (I think it's just there for historical reasons. We should work-around the issue in Cbc.jl, rather than upstream. The difference causes unexpected issues: <https://github.com/jump-dev/Cbc.jl/issues/154>). However, I want to keep with the upstream version number of v2.10.5. Do we have a way of disambiguating the "Yggdrasil" version from the "upstream" version?

text: BTW, cbc fails to load in General: <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/31558|https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/31558>
